lead_paragraph: Former world number one Lee Westwood wants to focus fully on his golf again this season after being distracted by a painful split from wife Laurae in 2015.

headline.print_headline: Westwood Fully Focused on Golf Again After Marriage Breakdown
headline.main: Westwood Fully Focused on Golf Again After Marriage Breakdown
